response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by our previous customers. Given its quality and unique features, it's worth more than $150 to us. Considering its value and what it can offer you, I'm extending an exclusive opportunity to purchase it for you at $120. This is a special offer tailored for you, Bob, reflecting both the product's worth and my desire to see you benefit from it. Please let me know if you're interested in this offer.", "product_price": 120}
